analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/23/0x5216b9c6f7c1e0e42d64cbe608a8d46594242c6a.sol:
	Contract PlanToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/23/0x5216b9c6f7c1e0e42d64cbe608a8d46594242c6a.sol#217)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/23/0x5216b9c6f7c1e0e42d64cbe608a8d46594242c6a.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/23/0x5216b9c6f7c1e0e42d64cbe608a8d46594242c6a.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/23/0x5216b9c6f7c1e0e42d64cbe608a8d46594242c6a.sol#85) is not in mixedCase
